NK100(the)005:1: // khrid ye shes 'khor lo gtan la dbab pa'i man ngag bzhugs so //
NK100(the)005:3: dz+ny+aa na tsakra a non a u pa d+he sha /
NK100(the)005:5: ye shes 'khor lo gtan la dbabs pa'i man ngag /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK100(the)005:6: 'gro ba'i mgon pos thugs la brgyud //
NK100(the)005:7: nges pa'i don la mos pa'i //
NK100(the)005:9: bsgom pa'i rim pa bshad par bya //
NK100(the)005:10: rang 'byung rig pa'i dbang chen ni //
NK100(the)005:11: dpe' don rtags dang ting 'dzin nyams //
NK100(the)005:12: bzhag thabs rgyud la btsal ba dang //
NK100(the)005:13: bcos pa'i thabs su shes par bya //
NK100(the)005:14: de la dang po dpe bstan pa //
NK100(the)005:15: bram ze gtsang mas khrus gsol te //
NK100(the)005:16: rgyal srid dag la dbang bsgyur bzhin //
NK100(the)005:17: ma lus sems can thams cad la //
NK100(the)005:18: byang chub snying por rang bzhin gnas //
NK100(the)005:19: de don rtogs par bya ba ni //
NK100(the)005:20: 'dus ma byas kyi de nyid la //
NK100(the)005:21: rang gi tshad dang ldan pa yin //
NK100(the)005:22: sems ni drag tu gtad par bya //
NK100(the)005:24: sems ni bde la gtang dka' ste //
NK100(the)005:25: ming du mi thogs nyams myong 'byung //
NK100(the)005:26: rtog pa med par gnas pa ni //
NK100(the)005:27: bya ba gtang ba'i skyes bu bzhin //
NK100(the)005:28: ci la yang mi gnas rang bzhin la //
NK100(the)005:29: ma yengs gsal ba lhug par gzhag /de don rgyud la btsal ba ni //
NK100(the)005:30: dper na gyi ling rta 'dul bzhin //
NK100(the)005:31: drag gzhan bar nas rtsol bas gdon //
NK100(the)005:32: ma yengs par ni btsa' bar bya //
NK100(the)005:34: dper na nam mkha'i sprin bzhin du //
NK100(the)005:35: byung yang zhi la gnod med ltar //
NK100(the)005:36: de bzhin byang chub sems la yang //
NK100(the)005:37: rtsol ba drag zhan tshod 'dzin pa'i //
NK100(the)005:38: rtog pas mi sgrib bcos mi dgos //
NK100(the)005:39: de don sems nyams bstan pa ni //
NK100(the)005:40: snang med 'khrul snang log pa tsam //
NK100(the)005:41: de nyid goms pas lam du bde //
NK100(the)005:42: chos sku ngos bzung mthun dpe ni //
NK100(the)005:43: gsal la mi rtog dus mnyam pa //
NK100(the)005:44: gsal la mi rtog sa le ba //
NK100(the)005:45: sa le ba la'ang rtog pa med //
NK100(the)005:46: ma bskyod rgya mtsho chen po dang //
NK100(the)005:47: til gyi mar me'i dpe bzhin no //
NK100(the)005:49: byang chub sems kyi rig pa la //
NK100(the)005:50: smyug mar gnas pa chos kyi sku //
NK100(the)005:52: de rjes mi bcad byang chub sems //
NK100(the)005:53: de don rtags ni dang zhing bde //
NK100(the)005:54: shes pa mi 'gyur bkrir mi gtum //
NK100(the)005:55: chu la mi 'da' nya bzhin du //
NK100(the)005:56: de la ma 'da' chos nyid rtags //
NK100(the)005:57: shes pa rtsis med drang por 'jug /dper na thi bya tshang 'jug bzhin //
NK100(the)005:58: snga phyi mi bsre shes pa la //
NK100(the)005:59: the tshom med par bzhag par bya //
NK100(the)005:60: rmangs rigs mi rnams thams cad kyis //
NK100(the)005:61: sems ni nyon mongs skye med kyang //
NK100(the)005:62: lus kyis nyon mongs mi 'chor ba //
NK100(the)005:63: rgyal pos dbang byed btsun mo 'dra //
NK100(the)005:64: shes pa rgod par gyur pa'i tshe //
NK100(the)005:65: dper na rkun mo tshor ma thag /ma bsgrad rang bzhin dengs pa bzhin //
NK100(the)005:66: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la //
NK100(the)005:67: ma byung ma skyes thag chod na //
NK100(the)005:68: rang bzhin dang gsal ngang gis bcos //
NK100(the)005:69: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor nyams //
NK100(the)005:70: shing bal lta bur lus 'jam pa //
NK100(the)005:72: chos rnams bde chen gsang ba'i nyams //
NK100(the)005:73: ye shes chen po'i mthun dpe ni //
NK100(the)005:74: mtha' dbus med pa nam mkha' 'dra //
NK100(the)005:75: ma skyes pas na yang nam mkha' 'dra //
NK100(the)005:77: de don rang 'byung ye shes la //
NK100(the)005:78: ji bzhin rnam gsum don gyi tshad //
NK100(the)005:79: rang snang gsal ba sgo lnga'i yul //
NK100(the)005:80: shes pa gsal ba chos kyi sku //
NK100(the)005:81: 'dzin pa med pa lhun gyis grub //
NK100(the)005:82: de las ma g.yos rtags bstan pa //
NK100(the)005:83: sgra rnams thos shing rmi lam bzang //
NK100(the)005:84: gzugs rnams mthong zhing bskor ba byed //
NK100(the)005:85: bdud rtsi 'dren zhing chos kyang ston //
NK100(the)005:86: de las ma g.yos dam pa'i rtags //
NK100(the)005:87: dper na khyung chen mkha' lding pa //
NK100(the)005:89: ri brag chu rlung bsam yas kyang //
NK100(the)005:91: rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK100(the)005:92: ji bzhin gzigs pa'i chos nyid la //
NK100(the)005:93: dus dang rnams pa thams cad du //
NK100(the)005:95: nor bu rin chen bcos legs na //
NK100(the)005:96: yon tan phun sum 'tshogs pa la //
NK100(the)005:98: de bzhin thams cad sems nyid las //
NK100(the)005:100: rang gi shes pa thang cad na //
NK100(the)005:101: bying rgod bya ba 'byung mi srid //
NK100(the)005:102: dper na skyes bu sngags ldan gyis //
NK100(the)005:103: mi mthun dug la sngags btab na //
NK100(the)005:104: nad rnams sel zhing smad du 'gyur //
NK100(the)005:105: ji srid bzhin pa'i don rtogs pas //
NK100(the)005:106: chags sdang la sogs dug rnams la //
NK100(the)005:107: shes rab gsal btab sngags kyis mchog /ji bzhin nyams kyi gnas lugs ni //
NK100(the)005:108: lkug pa'i nyams myong tshul bzhin du //
NK100(the)005:109: 'khur bar chu blugs dpe bzhin du //
NK100(the)005:110: tshad ma rnam gsum gtan la 'bebs //
NK100(the)005:111: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK100(the)005:112: yal bar 'dug pas nam yang men //
NK100(the)005:113: de don rgyun du ma yengs na //
NK100(the)005:114: dgongs pa rdo rje sems dang mnyam //
NK100(the)005:115: snang srid nges med phyir na sems //
NK100(the)005:116: sems la ngos bzung med pa'o //
NK100(the)005:117: de ba'i don rtogs chos kyi sku //
NK100(the)005:119: dad ldan byang chub gtsor len dang //
NK100(the)005:120: bla ma la gus sran 'dzugs pa //
NK100(the)005:121: de la bstan par bya ba yin //
NK100(the)005:122: lta bsgom kha gtam mu chor smra //
NK100(the)005:123: gsang sgo byang chub yal ngo dga' //
NK100(the)005:124: de la bstan na ltung bar 'gyur //
NK100(the)005:125: dpal a pa ra 'ag+hara tis mdzad pa //
NK100(the)005:126: rdzogs so ////rta rin chen dpal gyi phyag dpe'o //
